<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">ff35e94383559610b68c9640ceaad3a6</macroponent><name>card_base_container_1/size</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  if(api.item.value.selected==true) {
    return "Large";
  } else {
    return "Small";
  }
	return '';
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-21 21:15:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>1d214ecb83959610b68c9640ceaad328</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>card_base_container_1/size</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Drama" source="x_pamtn_drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Drama">8cf4690383559610b68c9640ceaad3b8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1d214ecb83959610b68c9640ceaad328</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>matt@pamtconsulting.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-21 21:15:54</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
